description: You find yourself standing in the middle of a raging storm.  Lightning
bolts crackle all about you and the constant thunder is deafening.  The
constant downpour stings your bare skin, but worse than that is the large
hail which pounds against you leaving bruises.  This isn't a very pleasant
place to stay for long.
1284.name: Tower Roof at the Heart of Winds

description: Cupboards cover the walls here.  Cabinets line the walls, a large fridge
here with nothing in it is seen.  A large sink is next to you.
1255.name: Kitchen

description: You are in a dark passageway. The walls are rough cut stone
that leads into almost what looks like a cave.
1285.name: Secret Passage

description: You are at the top of the stairs.  To the north is the living room and
down is to the kitchen.
1257.name: Stairs Going To The Kitchen

description: You are in the Immortal's Wing. To the north and south are doors
and the hallway leads east and west.
== Cyric's Chambers North ==
== Talos's Chambers South ==
1278.name: CLEAR

description: You stand on the outer edge of the kitchen.  Here to the east you see a
cupboard, and over the step up in the floor you are eye level with the
living room floor.
1254.name: Kitchen

description: As you step into this dark room you are afraid.
The lighting is dim, and the air musty. You see a leather couch, a huge desk,
and a desk chair. The desk has the description:
There is a closed door to the north. You wonder what's behind it...
1270.name: Nexus's Office

description: Dim light and soft music dawn your attention as you enter the slightly
chilled room.  Pieces of mahogany furniture stained black and white are
strategically scattered about.  The north wall contains a large brass bed
covered in sheets made of silk and satin.  Along the east wall a fireplace,
made of white and black jade, provides the only warmth for the room.  In
front of the fireplace, the only thing covering the swirled hunter green and
white marble floor, a large bearskin rug.  Along the walls are various
pictures, each adorned with black frames against the walls of silky white.
1249.name: Ren's Room

description: You are on the grand staircase.  Up is the 2nd story of the mansion, and
south is the first story os the mansion.  The stairs are made from ancient
wood, still in perfect condition.  The railings are forged from steel from
the Dwarven Kingdom.  Above in the third story you see a huge skylight.
1227.name: CLEAR

description: You stand in a large room, with a low ceiling.  There is green carpeting
and wood panneled walls.  There is furniture spread around the room, and
other appliances.  There are no windows, but it's still very cool here.  A
bar is in the middle of the room, with stools around it.  There are very few
people here, but whenever someone is here they welcome you with, well, as
much of a smile as they're gonna give ya.
1293.name: Lounge

description: You are in a wet dank basement.  To the north is a cage with monsters
inside slashing at each other.  To the south is a door to the food and arms
storage.  The stairs are to the west and the basement goes on west.
1220.name: In The Basement

description: You stand at the end of a little hallway.  To the north a large iron door
stands shut, a large sign is posted above the peep hole that reads {!
DANGER!  : Satan Inside{x.  The door is locked and bolted shut.  To the
south is nothing.
1221.name: In The Basement

description: You are at the stairs leading up.  Up is to the living room and east is
to the kitchen.
1256.name: Stairs Going To The Living Room

description: This chamber is made completly out of the bones of the unfaithful.
Pitful moans fill the air.The stench of death hangs heavy in the
room.On the south wall, raised on a dais of pure platinum. Sits
a throne of rotting flesh.
1281.name: Chamber Of Woe

description: north - Nisstyre's Office (room 19626)
east - Nisstyre's Living Room (room 1295)
south - The Stairs to the Tower (room 5725)
west - The Westbridge Mortuary (room 495)
down - Nisstyre's Doorstep (room 1273)
You step into a large black hearse. The inside is bigger than
it looks like from the outside. The room is very well dressed.
There is a large black sofa here with two end tables. On the
opposite wall there is large marble fireplace. Towards the
front of the hearse is a large bar. Behind the bar there is
a juke box. The drivers area up front has been changed into
a fold out bed.
1277.name: Inside The Hearse

description: You stand inside apartment number 2.  You see the floor goes up three
steps right infront of you.  To the east you see the kitchen and to the west
you see the stairs going up to the living room.  A large kitchen table sits
here.
1251.name: Inside Apartment 2

description: You stand outside of an apartment.  The door seems old and rotting off
its hinges.  To the west you see apartment 1.  To the north is apartment 2.
1250.name: Hallway outside the Apartment

description: You stand at the end of the Immortal Wing. There
is an entrance to a tower north and south.
== Teron's Chambers North ==
== Nisstyre's Chambers South ==
1271.name: Immortal's Wing

description: You are in the passage leading to a very large cave.
1288.name: Passageway

description: {WA huge {1blood{W covered iron maiden sits here.
{WA chair of {*s{wp{*i{wk{*e{ws{W sits here infront of you.  Flesh still dripping
{1blood{W is draped from the arms and seat.
{*The walls of this room are created of blood, quivering
{*pa{Rrapets of{* li{Rquid gor{*e. {RTaking a{* clo{Rser{* look yo{Ru{* can
{*se{Re {*the ou{Rt{*lin{Re {*of to{Rr{*mented faces wr{Ri{*th{Ri{*ng in a{Rg{*ony
{*wi{Rth{*in  th{Re{* pu{Rl{*sating {*surfac{Re{* of the {Rw{*all{Rs{*. A po{Rr{*trait
{*of{R a dark s{*un {Rspans th{*e enti{Rr{*e surfac{Re{* of {Rt{*he fl{Ro{*or,
{*pa{Ryi{*ng homage {Rt{*o The{R O{*ne and All. The ceilin{Rg{* of this
{*en{Ror{*mous chamb{Re{*r is n{Ro{*t visa{Rb{*le to th{Re{* human {Re{*ye{R.{* The
{*sh{Rri{*eking of c{Rh{*ildren {*and so{Rb{*ing of b{Ro{*th women {Ran{*d men
{*ca{Rn {*be heard r{Re{*sonati{Rn{*g f{Rrom ever{*y su{Rr{*face in t{Rhe{* room.
{*This room makes you feel as if you should'nt be here.{x
1201.name: {wThrone Room of the {RT{ro{Wr{*tur{Wo{ru{Rs{w King{x

description: A huge chandelier made of a unique crystal design is hanging at the
ceiling high above you.  The room itself is inlaid with crystalized
portraits of lost and victorious adventurers of the past.  An altar stands
along the northern wall with two candles and a picture of a unfamiliar face.
The smell of incense is smelt around you with strange green smoke stenching
the chamber.  A huge fur-like circular-shaped rug is placed in the central
part of the room with a logo of a huge "R" and Rzarecta's visage engraved upon
it.  Strange statues of a warrior, priest, mage, thief, ranger and druid
furnish the surroundings of the room as an exhibit to visitors.  To the east
are grand portraits of the immortals of Waterdeep.  A special portrait is
layed from where you came from of Celestia.  The room itself is enchanting
with a strange tone of soothing music heard around you..  Soothing your
chaotic mind momentarily.  A stairway of sort descends from here into..??
1266.name: Enter the Rzarecta's Chamber

description: You stand in a large storage room.  The whole place is covered with boxes
and crates.  You see all kinds of crap in here, things from the ages of old.
To the west and the east you see large doors leading to someplace unknown.
A small cold breeze blows in from the south.
1226.name: Storage Room

description: You are in the second room. It is even darker, only
your light source is helping you see. There is a
dark oak coffin in the corner, a fridge covered in
cobwebs, and a HUGE safe in the wall. Now, youv'e done it.
You are in Nexus's personal space.
You better leave.
1267.name: Nexus's Bedroom

description: {6The most beautiful room in the world is what you've walked into.
You notice {1red {2roses{6 from A{1e{!ni{1m{6a all over the room. The windows
are done in a stained glass with pictures of angels. As you stare into
the windows they seem to almost come alive with happiness. It's just
like a dream and you never feel like waking up again. In the lost times
a new world was completed by Aenima. A world for him and his love
Alyra to share together. This room in symbolic of the struggle they both
have. Two worlds brought together to form a new world. Two lives
together to both share happiness, shall this room be the center of
time for this world for here you can view the new world of Evil
Intentions, watch the love just grow.
1262.name: Savvy's Room

description: A large meeting table encompasses the whole room here, able to seat at
least thirty people.  There is a blackboard on the wall for people to do
presentations and a podium for speeches in the far corner.
1244.name: Meeting Room

description: === THIS ROOM IS OFF LIMITS TO ALL ===
1276.name: War Room

description: The light is dimmer here. You see the walls are
made from rough cut stone.
1290.name: Passageway

description: This part of the mansion is still under construction.
1294.name: CLEAR

description: You stand in the Construction Trailer Of Nisstyre I.  Bloodstoner.
A large desk stands in the middle of the room, filled with all kinds
of diffrent papers.  On the walls surrounding the desk, you see
blueprint after blueprint of diffrent areas.  The windows, which are
inbetween the maps overlook a strange new land, something you don't
reconize.
1205.name: Nisstyre's Construction Trailer

description: Its a bare tower. It goes up.
1274.name: Teron's Section

description: Stepping through the door, you stand in a huge tower The walls are jet
black, and look like they are made of obsidian.  The walls spiral up to the
top of the tower, which you cannot see.  There is a huge bloodstaind black
altar on the northern wall, with candles lining it.  There is a huge bed in
the corner, and beside that a table, with a radio on it.  Out of the radio,
you can hear the sounds of Tool.  Torches hang off the walls, illuminating
the dark and dismal place.
1269.name: Dubh's Dungeon

description: You are in a dark passageway. The walls are rough cut stone
that leads into almost what looks like a cave.
1286.name: Secret Passage

description: Very Simple just use the special name listed below with the GET ?? CHEST
Object Name                  Special Name
Quest Token                  QT
50 Ticket                    FT
100 Ticket                   HUN
25 Ticket                    TF
So to get a single token you would type GET QT CHEST.
-Nisstyre
{*You stand in the {5Black{* {%Light{* Room.  The Whole Room is dark for
the {*exception of the {@g{^l{$o{!  W{#i{5n{1g{* objects that hang on the
walls.  {%M{5u{%s{5i{%c{* {*plays from god knows where, but you like it.
Along the top of the ceiling you see {%PURPLE {$tubes{* of {^lights{*.  The
room seems to be filled {*with some kind of smoke...  {x
1224.name: Black Light Room

description: {*As you walk into this room you see it is very dark and {4damp{*. All
that can really be seen is the seven {!candles{* around the room.
The aura in this room is that of {1evil{*. Trent is the master of
{!love{* with a sacrifice. As you can see the walls are covered with
poems and writings of {4love{* and {4hate{*. In the middle of the room
is a stone altar, what it's used for no one really knows. It is said on
the wall that if you lay on the altar and chant '{&Indominus sayas obesk
santana{*' that Trent will arrive and take your {1soul{* for his bidding
of evil. Also you notice a pair of shacles on the wall. You think
to yourself this place is strange. To the followers of Trent this place
is a {$h{^e{&av{^e{$n{* to the others it is a {1h{!el{1l{*. Some books are
laying on the ground here. You see the title '{&Se{*v{&en {1S{*in{1s{*' and
toss the book down. On your way out you realize you have grown to love
Trent. For some reason he is a part of you now.{0{7
1265.name: Trent's Lair

description: {x
| 11000 - Ragnarok Sword                 15d25  (Divine) 195 375  40 +15 +15  F   V     G    I N     N N                        |
| 11805 - Apocalypse Sword:  Pestilence  13d24  (GsBite) 169 312   5 +20 +20     SV SP  GH    MN B   N         BN               |
| 11806 - Apocalypse Sword:  Famine      13d24  (AcBite) 169 312   5 +20 +20     SV SP  GH    MN B   N         BN               |
| 14142 - Darrowmere Quest Weapon        14d22  (Wrath ) 161 308  50 +15 +15  FFVS  SP  GH     N           N    N               |
|  5195 - Sword Eternal Damnation        13d23  (Slash ) 156 299  50 +15 +15  FFV V SP  GHD    N B   N         BN               |
| 18213 - Shimmering Sword of Dragonkind 13d22  (Slash ) 149 286   2 +17 +20  FF S  S   GH    MN B   N          N               |
| 20281 - Sword of the Embalmed          13d21  (AcBite) 149 273  40 +15 +15    VSV     G    I N     N N        N               |
| 20258 - Sword of the Tortured          13d21  (ShBite) 143 273  40 +15 +15     SV S   G    I N     N N        N               |
|    91 - Sword of the Crucified         13d21  (FlBite) 143 273  40 +15 +15  F  SV     G    I N     N N        N               |
| 14820 - Gor Gor Left Claw              13d21  (Slash ) 143 273  20 +15 +15  F  SV    PG    I N     N N        N               |
| 14821 - Gor Gor Right Claw             13d21  (Slash ) 143 273  20 +15 +15  F  SV    PG    I N     N N        N               |
|  1887 - Morningstar Luck Draw Star      2d125 (Crush ) 126 250  80 +22 + 2  FF         H   IM                B                |
| 31316 - Firebrand Flame Axe            13d19  (Flame ) 130 247   0 +12 +12  F  S      G     M    A N          N               |
| 31315 - Frostchill Dagger              13d19  (Chill ) 130 247   0 +12 +12   F S      G     M    A N          N               |
| 31318 - AcidHeart Polearm Halberd      13d19  (AcBite) 130 247   0 + 7 + 7     S   P  G     M    A N          N               |
| 51800 - Scimitar Frostbrand Sword      24d10  (Slash ) 132 240  40 +10 +17   F S      GH    MN B             B                |
1206.name: The Weapons Vault

description: This room strangely looks like a oversized doghouse, unfortunately, it
reeks of the smell of...  Dog.  There are stuffed heads of various past
kills, and in the center of the room, a very large stuffed cat carcass.  In
the corner is a small bed with ripped sheets and covered with dirt.  You
look more closely at the bed and see small rubber squeaky toys under the
bed.  You open the fridge and treat yourself to a nice doggie biscuit.
Showing on the televison are reruns of Lassie.
1253.name: Mutt's Doghouse

description: You are inside a cage with a lot of mobs. Better get out.
1225.name: Caged Mobs/Role Playing Tokens

description: It is a large painting in an oak frame.  It shows Teron and Nisstyre, the
true creators of the realms.  The two creators stand side by side as they
survey their ultimate creation, Waterdeep.
You have entered a large hall, with a stone floor and wooden walls.
Statues of Teron are spread around the room, some made of gold, others jade.
Some tapestries cover the walls, showing many great battles of Teron in his
mortal days.  The ceiling spans almost as high as you can see.  There is
almost absolutely no noise, except for your heart beating in your chest.  A
large painting is on the wall.  There is a very powerful aura to this room.
Better watch yourself.
1272.name: Hall of the Creator

description: You float in a mass of stars.  Only a single throne stands, which
seems to be the middle of the room, if this is even a room.  To the
east of the throne, you see a world of some sort.  To the west, you
see the Great Realms...  A shooting star zooms across the "room"...
1200.name: Ao's Layer

description: This is the place where Kaz and Morus hold their meetings.  Ancient
paintings of Westbridge and the gods of the lands adorn the walls.  A large
circular table sits in the middle of the room.  It is covered with Ancient
writings and Magical symbols.  You feel a healing aura as you enter the
room.
1291.name: Parliament Meeting Hall

description: Darkness has taken over your sight.
1289.name: Passageway

description: You are overwhelmed upon entering this very large room from the mass
amount of material that clutters the shelves here.  Everything that has ever
happened is documented in here.  The question is ...  Can you find what you
are looking for?
1245.name: Library of Waterdeep's Past

description: You have entered a large room, with wood panelled walls and a low
ceiling.  The room has a strange glow to it.  A powerful aura
fills the office, and seems to have no source.  The walls are covered
with paintings and tapestries, depicting Teron`s many battles as a
mortal.  You see a large wooden desk in the back of the room, and a
chair.  A small refridgerator is in the corner.  There are no exits.
1275.name: Teron's Office

description: This room has a nice relaxing feel to it.  It was designed for a one on
one talk with with the reporter and witness upon a current news situation.
1243.name: Private Room

description: The Tower is Bare.  Carved from midnight black marble this room is
completely unadorned, save for the hugs silver hoop that hangs in the center
of the four walls.  The shining metal glitters in the light, and you notice
hundreds of tiny glyphs have been etched onto their smooth surface.  Within
the confines of the silver, the blackness is deeper and colder than any you
have ever witnessed.  From these shadows you feel a strange pull, an odd
desire to see what lies on the other side....
1279.name: Portals of Pain

description: This rooms walls are made out of large granite bricks, and the floor is
made of smooth obsidian.  A stone throne rests in the middle of the room.
You can here the storm outside raging, and some of the hailstones come in
the window.  The frequent flashes of lightning are blinding, but give the
room an eerie strobe effect.
1283.name: Throne Room of Talos

description: You are on the bottom of the stairs going up to the first floor.
1219.name: Stairs To The First Floor

description: You have entered the offices of where the news reporters of the world of
Waterdeep do all their work and articles.  The walls here are made of some
sort of cheap ply wood made to look like oak, and the cold stone floor is
covered with a fuzzy blue carpet.  A single desk resides in the center of
the room with a paper stack rising to the ceiling.  Writing utensils are
scattered about.  A small ivory name tag sits on the desk saying "Sandra
Washerwing.
1242.name: News Office

description: This sma l room is bare, save for the broken, bloody corpses that lie
scattered all over the room.  Though in various states of decay, the
shattered bodies all bear one thing in common...  All have been utterly
pulverised, ripped, in many cases, literally limb from limb.  The rough
walls are caked thickly with blood and gore, and the stench of death is
almost overwhelming.
l
1280.name: Inquisitor's Chamber

description: The room is littered with boxes, all of them with the Word's
'Mobaar's Comedy Relief' written on it.As you enter, you see
popular stars like Whoopie Goldberg and The Blues Brothers
dedicating themselves to a good cause.  Then you see Mobaar.
You then feel like throwing all of your money at him, but
then he says 'Save it for the Homeless.'  So you do.
Mobaar appears to be a nice gentle man, and he is very
nice to all that are nice to him.
His entertainment is playing improv jazz on his trumpet.
You love it!!!.
1261.name: * Welcome to The Comedy Relief *

description: This is where the boundaries of fantasy and reality collide. Where dawn gently
persuades the moon and stars to sleep beneath their blanket of darkness as she takes
their place to greet the world. The softest of pinks,
oranges, purples, yellows, whites, and blues paint the sky with their brilliance. In
the distance a stairway of clouds descend to the unknown. Winged horses frolicking
around an enchanted waterfall add to the feeling of
tranquillity this place offers. Below the cloud-covered floor of this room can be seen
all of the country and her mortal creations. Up here, above the clouds is where
Celestia Aurora comes to relax and watch over all mortals. One step
in this room fills even the angriest of souls with peace. Love invades and heals your
tortured heart, and as you turn to leave, a gentle breeze caresses your cheek and
whispers softly, You are forgiven...
1268.name: Celestia's Room

description: Tickets
{!A Ticket For {^25 {!Tokens
{!A Ticket For {^50 {!Tokens
{!A Ticket For {^100 {!Tokens
{1* Quest Items are listed in HELP QUEST-PRIZES
{2If no one is in the shop to service you please
Just Yell "{!COULD I GET SOME SERVICE HERE!!{2"{x
You stand in a large garage.  The room is covered with different
inventions that you can ride around here.  You see large lots of tools and
rags thrown around this room also.  A large ramp goes up and out of the
basement and onto the mansion's lawn.
1222.name: Garage

description: You arrive in a puff of smoke.  You are surrounded by fire and brim
stone.  Millions of torched and rotting corpses surrounds a large red figure
holding a pitch fork in the middle of the realms.  Welcome To Hell Sucker....
1223.name: Welcome to Hell

description: This shack reeks of dog shit and beer.  This is the home of Curtis the
Crackhead, who sells the best drugs in Waterdeep.  But only the fortunate
are given access to these good drugs.  Empty pizza boxes and vodka bottles
litter the floor.  Man this place is a dump, I would definitely not want to
live here.
1282.name: Curtis's Crack Shack

description: {x  Great Oak Panels line the walls of the room, they shine with their highly
polished surfaces and give off the aura of great craftmenship.  The floor is
covered in lush burgendy shag carpet which streches from wall to wall.  Large
windows look out northwards over the landscape, showing the steadily declining
hillside that sits under      {Y,   {y."".   {Y,{x    the house, stretching out into
the numberous mountain      {Y, {M#   {y|{C(){y|   {M# {Y,{x   valleys in the area.  Beyond
the hill outside the view  {&_{M#{&_{M#{&___{y|{&__{y|{&___{M#{&_{M#{&__{x opens into two other mountains
in the distance, between  {&[{*__________________{&]{x  them a valley way off.  A
Spyglass sits on a tripod  {r|-_ -=__=-_ -==_-|{x  near the window pointed to the
valley, and if one was to  {r|_{7.------------.{r=|{x  look into the glass, they would
see the city of Torregiano {r|={7| {*o        {*o {7|{r=|{x off in the far distance.  The
southern wall is built of {r_|-{7| {*!   {R`(   {*! {7|{r-|_{x the same great oak wood but in
the fashion of book      {r/==_{7| {*! {r_{R({Y_.{R){r_ {*!{7 |{r=_-\{x cases, filled to the brim with
leader bound novels.     {r|=- {7|{*/^\{R^{r={Y^^{r={R^{*/^\{7|{r _=|{x On the remaining walls hangs a
collection of paintings and photographs.  At the eastern end of the room is a
large stone fireplace with two leather chairs in front of it, and a large
multi-sectional couch between them.  A large oak coffee table sits around the
circle of furniture in front of the fireplace.
1295.name: Nisstyre's Living Room

description: You step into a huge cave. Bats scretch from the presents of your light.
You have entered the Batcave. You think of the old time batman with
all these high tech thingies...WRONG. You see a very large couch
and a fridge in the shape of the bat symbol. A large keg sits
in the middle of the room and you cannot wait to see what comes
next.
1287.name: Batcave

description: {x
{x12024 - The Gem of Power (Floater)
{x        +1 Damroll, +2 Hitroll, +30 HP, +30 Mana
1208.name: {c[{CEquipment{c] {RT{rhe {RI{rmm{RQ{ruest {RP{rrize {RL{rist{x

description: You stand in a large hall, where blueprints, lumber, supplies and other
construction type stuff sits around.  A large rough table sits in the middle
of the room, with blueprints about.  You see some workers sleeping an the
couches that sit along the wall, on the chalk board you see asignments
glore.
1246.name: Construction Workers Meeting Hall

description: This room is full of oddities that wont be found anywhere else in
the realms.  The shop looks quite dirty, a thin layer of dust has
settled over all the items in the room.  To your right sits the
counter and the cash register.
1202.name: Goldoth's Variety Shop

description: You step into one of the mansions large tower. Heh, makes your laught,
a tower on a mansion. The walls here are black marble and look like they've
been smashed and other wierd stuff.
1273.name: Nisstyre's Doorstep

1216.room_name: The Mansion Guard stands here, making sure strangers don't get into the mansion.
1216.name: The Mansion Guard~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
Before your eyes is a tall, diesel man dressed completely in black.  His
hair has been combed to perfection and slicked back, and his eyes are hidden
by inpenetrable shades.  He bears the symbol of the Tri Power Goverment on
his jacket.  He is none other than the president's personal guard.
1217.room_name: A strong strudy man is scanning the area beneath his shades here.
1217.name: Larry~
subroutines:
M speech 1201 follow me boys~
M random 1202 10~
M act 1204 looks at you~

description:
Before your eyes is a tall, diesel man dressed completely in black.  His
hair has been combed to perfection and slicked back, and his eyes are hidden
by inpenetrable shades.  He bears the symbol of the Tri Power Goverment on
his jacket.  He is none other than the president's personal guard.
1218.room_name: A tall man dressed in black is standing here keeping guard.
1218.name: Bobby~
subroutines:
M speech 1201 follow me boys~
M random 1203 10~
M act 1205 looks at you~

1219.d_flags: D WHAT?!? WHAAAAT!?! YOU ALL WILL PAY DEARLY FOR MY DEMISE!!!!!~
description:
Your eyes feast upon a powerful Red Wizard of Thay.  Specialized in the wizard school of Invocation/Evocation, Xanaduul is one of the most powerful living Invokers on the face of Faerun.  His powers are rumored to be immense enough
to rival the strongest of wizards, even Elminster himself.
1219.room_name: A {1crimson{0 robed wizard hovers here, his hood covering his face.
1219.name: {1Xanaduul {8the {1I{!n{#v{&o{#k{!e{1r{0~
subroutines:
M fight 1219 20~
M fight 1220 20~
M fight 1221 50~
M fight 1222 3~
1219.t_flags: T Nothing shall remain of you when I'm through.~

description:
This menacing looking contraption sends chills running up and down your spine.  
Its large sturdy construction has helped it to surpass the years of tearing limbs from the sockets of heretics. 
Huge cast iron wheels are mounted to the bottom of the device to make it portable.
1220.room_name: The Torture Rack sits here waiting to ssstttrrreeetttccchhh its next victim.
